name: Bring Mobile Motion Film Festival to life!
blurb: International Smartphone Film Festival unveiling a new wave of great talents with small cameras. Think Big, Start Small!

name: New Urbanism Film Festival - 2nd Annual
blurb: A film festival about urban planning, architecture, bicycle advocacy, tactical urbanism, & public health.

name: Reel Sisters 17th Anniversary Film Festival
blurb: Reel Sisters brings films directed, written & produced by women of color across the globe to the big screen. Film lovers unite!

name: Cinema on the Edge! Best of the Beijing Indie Film Festival
blurb: Groundbreaking & uncensored Chinese films at NYC's best museums and cinemas. Aug 7 - Sept 13, 2015.

name: Trip to R'lyeh 20th H.P. Lovecraft Film Festival Cthulhu Con
blurb: Head to R'lyeh to get unique Cthulhu & Miskatonic U artifacts for the 20th H.P. Lovecraft Film Fest & CthulhuCon - Portland OR, Oct 2-4

name: Olde E
blurb: A short film and advanced project from USC's acclaimed film school enters festival circuit and conducts outreach among at-risk youth.

name: Rooftop Films: More Than A Film Festival
blurb: Support Rooftop Films year-round and city-wide efforts to serve our audience, our filmmakers, and the cultural landscape of NYC.

name: Portrait by Above Bounds Theatre Collective
blurb: Portrait is Above Bounds new family show which uses comedy, mask, puppetry and clowning in order to tell a story.

name: Help The Kinsey Sicks Conquer the World's Largest Arts Fest!
blurb: Help spread joy, Dragapella®, & comedic subversiveness globally! We still need your help! Go to kinseysicks.com to learn more!

name: bring the children home...
blurb: A play about people's search for meaning and identity in a world gone crazy.  Raving Native Productions at the MN Fringe.

name: Hamlet the Hip-Hopera
blurb: A new musical that amplifies the world of Shakespeare’s HAMLET.

name: Forefront Festival 2015
blurb: Christian art doesn't have a great track record. Let's change that together. Join us for a festival of film, music, discourse and more.

name: Hi! Hello! Namaste? A Bollywood dance drama at the MN Fringe
blurb: The first Bollywood dance drama at MN Fringe; an extravaganza of color, culture, and dance, swirling together to tell a moving story.

name: The Spinning Wheel: a son remixes a father's radical archive
blurb: A collab between Baba Israel, Leo Kay, and Yako 440 to remix, exhibit, and dialogue with steve ben israel's archive of art and activism

name: SHORTLANDS - L.A.'S ULTIMATE UNDERGROUND FILM COMPETITION
blurb: Shortlands is a new festival that challenges filmmakers to write, shoot, and edit a short film in 5 adrenaline-fueled rounds per year.

name: Amelia Earhart... IN SPACE!!!
blurb: Orginal comedy premiering at Capital Fringe Festival in July. The story of what really happened to Amelia Earhart after her last flight

name: Mama's Eggnog (goes to NY for the Samuel French OOBFest.)
blurb: Thrilled that my play is one of the 30 finalists in the Samuel French OOB Festival! We have the honor of performing it in New York!

name: Harambe Live: How to make an idea go viral
blurb: An event to teach businesses how to create viral content, while paying tribute to internet phenomenon of Harambe. Expect lots of memes.

name: Karol's Message
blurb: Proceeds from this campaign will allow this unique film about courage to reach its intended audience through inclusion in festivals.

name: Help Mobile Motion Film Festival move further!
blurb: Switzerland's first International Smartphone Film Festival is levelling the playingfield for filmmakers from around the world!

name: One Coast Collaboration
blurb: A culturally driven new play development lab designed to build bridges between national playwrights and Seattle based theatre artists.

name: The Second Annual Women Sports Film Festival
blurb: Join us in smashing stereotypes, breaking barriers, and celebrating female athletes and storytellers through documentary film.

name: Solstice Shorts Festival 2017: Dusk
blurb: The 4th Solstice Shorts Festival: Live Stories Poems & Songs from Scotland to Cornwall as darkness falls on the shortest day

name: KCT SummerFest 2018 presents: Disney's Beauty & the Beast
blurb: Be Our Guest! Play a leading role and support our local production of Disney's Beauty and the Beast!

name: The Exponential Festival 2019
blurb: A month-long January festival for NYC-based emerging, experimental performing artists. A pleasure, a mess, a thrill, and a dream.

name: RAP'T @ SummerFest 2018
blurb: A play about Jesus Christ visiting two guys from Queens to tell them He's ending the world and it's all their fault.

name: Innsmouth & Cthulhu Tiki: 2018 H. P. Lovecraft Film Festival
blurb: EOD Meets Tiki! Artifacts from the ruins of Innsmouth to support the 23rd H. P. Lovecraft Film Festival® Oct 5-7, 2018 in Portland, OR

name: Classic City Fringe Festival FUNdraiser
blurb: Annual non-profit event showcasing a spectrum of performing arts from the avant-garde to family friendly.

name: Cthulhu Mythos of Leng: 2019 H. P. Lovecraft Film Festival
blurb: Arcane artifacts from the 24th H. P. Lovecraft Film Festival® with Victoria Price, Roger Corman, & Richard Stanley's Color Out of Space

name: The Exponential Festival 2020
blurb: A month-long January festival for NYC-based emerging, experimental performing artists. We help artists take root.

name: Cartoon Fair 2020 - Le salon des séries animées
blurb: La première convention pour les fans adultes et adolescents de dessins animés à succès tel que Steven Universe, Adventure Time, MLP...

name: Online African Film Festival (OAFF) new platform
blurb: 24h LEFT TO SUPPORT the new streaming platform & festival for AFRICAN and DIASPORA films | Available worldwide | All year long

name: Stream the 25th H. P. Lovecraft Film Festival & Cthulhu Con
blurb: The 25th Anniversary event will be online this year! Get streaming passes (worldwide) and exclusive rewards only through this campaign.

name: Unsorted
blurb: A fantastical theatre show for children and families about expressing your identity and feeling connected with others.

name: SUGAR AND SH*T
blurb: Help us debut Sugar and Sh*t at Hollywood Fringe Festival in August 2021!

name: Attend or Stream H. P. Lovecraft Film Festival & Cthulhu Con
blurb: The 26th Annual event will feature in-person theatrical screenings Oct 1-3 at the Hollywood Theatre, and a streaming edition Oct 8-10!

name: Esc Shortfilm
blurb: La ópera prima de un grupo de jóvenes cineastas atrapados dentro de una historia sin salida...

name: H.P. Lovecraft Film Festival: Cthulhu at Arkham World's Fair
blurb: 28th Annual event Oct 6-8, 2023, with new & classic movies, guests, panels, and fun at the historic Hollywood Theatre in Portland, OR.

name: Fatlesque Fest Northwest is Brewing in Seattle
blurb: An all plus size burlesque festival is making its debut in 2023 in Seattle, Washington.

name: Art House presents The Complete Works of Wes Anderson
blurb: The peculiar, meticulous and whimsical oeuvre of one of cinema's most distinctive auteurs.

name: Eugene Art House presents: The Films of Federico Fellini
blurb: Enjoy a curated selection of Federico Fellini's feature films on the big screen at Eugene's Art House Cinema.

name: 27th H. P. Lovecraft Film Festival & Cthulhu Con Roaring 20s
blurb: Join us Oct 7-9 for in-person theatrical screenings at the Hollywood Theatre in Portland, OR or stream films at home worldwide.

name: Weird on Top: David Lynch - A Retrospective Film Series
blurb: Enjoy a curated selection of David Lynch's feature and short films on the big screen at Eugene's Art House Cinema.
